message: I created a private group with a name and description that should not have been public, and just found it on Google!

@mhueber Yes, private groups descriptions and names are visible so that people can find them and request access.  We're considering adding a "stealth" group where its description, name, and the fact that you're a member of it are hidden, but that might be something we end up charging for.
@mhuebert perhaps changing the url and title, in group actions, will help?
